data.name: XContainerWindowEventHandler
desc: Handles events fired by windows represented by a com.sun.star.awt.XWindow interface.

methods.name: callHandlerMethod
desc: Handles an event generated by a window.

The implementation must be aware that the EventObject argument contains types which it is not prepared to handle. Similarly this applies for the MethodName argument. In this case the method should simply return false.

methods.name: getSupportedMethodNames
desc: returns a sequence of supported method names
